solution_line_template: Jason and Harry purchased a total of {jason_bought} + {harry_bought} = <<{jason_bought}+{harry_bought}={total_purchased}>>{total_purchased} bottles of milk.
So, there are {initial_bottles} - {total_purchased} = <<{initial_bottles}-{total_purchased}={bottles_left}>>{bottles_left} bottles of milk left on the store shelf.
